18.5 Antibiotic Associated Diarrhoea 
Discontinuation of antibiotics is encouraged in patients with Antibiotic Associated Diarrhea. 
Send stool sample for Clostridium difficile – Glutamate Dehydrogenase (GDH) and Toxin Detection by ELISA 
or RDT (or PCR if available). 
Management: 
Oral vancomycin 125mg QID  
Add IV Metronidazole 500 mg TDS if toxic megacolon or ileus or hypotension is present
